data.eml:eml: Annotated catalogue of South American Dalodesmidae (Diplopoda, Polydesmida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mesibov, Robert (2017): Annotated catalogue of South American Dalodesmidae (Diplopoda, Polydesmida). Zootaxa 4338 (3): 507-525, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.3.6
